column5: A beautiful, cozy home located in a perfect location 30 minutes away from Dallas downtown and in the heart of Plano. A 2 minute walk to a strip mall which has a Walmart, banks and restaurants. Would be perfect for a business or vacation trip for a bachelor. The apartment has a kitchen, a bathroom and a patio. Ample parking space, pool and gym on site. Although there is only one bed, but you can bring in your temporary blow beds.
